title: Today is Saturdayï¼Œ but how to get the LEGACY CHEST
body: It says that LEGACY CHEST is  available at weekends for 295 RP, but I did't see any of legacy chests in the store . Anyone knows how to get that?

replies.body:
It's in the client right now! :D

I believe the issue was that it would be available Saturday PST, not AEST.
